title: GTA V Download & Crack
description:
Before downloading read this: Don't ever claim work from owners! You can even get banned!
==================================================================================

1) Download the torrent and start the torrent download into anywhere you want (that place in which you're downloading the torrent into BECOMES YOUR GAME FOLDER).
2) Whilst torrent is downloading, install social club from link in description.
3) Install all the REQUIRED SOFTWARE in description.
4) Once torrent is done, download patch v3 from description.
5) Install patch v3 into your game folder (step 1 tells you where your game folder is; the place where your torrent downloaded inti.
6) Once patch is installed, turn off ALL ANTI-VIRUSES including firewall etc and start the game by opening LAUNCHER.EXE
7) Enjoy - please subscribe, share this video and check out my newest video 
(GTA V MONEY, AMMO, ETC HACK)

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

1) Does this work for Windows 7?
Yes, this works for Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1 & 10.

2) Is there a compressed file (smaller than 60GB)?
Not that I'm aware of, I'm afraid.

3) Does this have online?
Not yet, try Tungle though.

4) How do I speed up torrents?
Right-click on the torrent and set bandwidth allocation to high.

5) Can I run this game?
Click on this link -- http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/... and press can I run it: it'll you.

6) How can I change languages?
regedit.exe

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeÃ‚Â­Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto V]
"Language"="en-US" (Change US to whatever you want)

7) If you have error "Please start Grand Theft Auto V with PlayGTAV.exe"
Your antivirus is blocking files due to a False Positive - install update patch with antivirus disabled and add game folder to exceptions then use Launcher.exe to run game.

----------------------------------------Ã‚Â­Ã‚Â­Ã‚Â­--------------------------------------Ã‚Â­-

- If you have error "Please start Grand Theft Auto V with PlayGTAV.exe" --- Your antivirus is blocking files due to a False Positive - install update patch with antivirus disabled and add game folder to exceptions then use Launcher.exe to run game.


- Your username on Windows CANNOT contain special characters !!!! use a-z and 1-9 characters and create a new user account or change your username !!

- If something is wrong about Social Club account in game go to Program Files and delete folder Rockstar Games and install Social Club again after that

- Windows 7 users must have Service Pack 1 installed otherwise you cannot login onto Social Club.

- Do NOT shoot anything from the Car or Bike , game will crash - is a developers bug !! Use quick-throwing when aiming with a firearm instead (LT+left pad or right click + G) 

- If your game is crashing at switching characters: either you need to update video card driver or to BUY A NEW VIDEO CARD .

- Error "Your offline activation data could not be loaded" : set your PC Date/Time to 18 Apr 2015

Solution to avoid Blitz heist crash:
After you have hit Security truck DO NOT leave your truck! 

1: Drive behind Security truck
2: Aim back doors and hit Mouse 1 button to throw a sticky bomb
3: Hit "G" key to explode
4: Continue mission until you must destroy Garbage truck 
5: Leave Garbage truck and go take your car 
(before go in the car select Sticky bomb from Inventory)
6: Inside the car aim Garbage truck and hit Mouse 1 to throw the Sticky bomb
7: Hit "G" key to explode 
8: Drive car to the right on main street and you are ready to advance in game.
